IsCaretMovedWhenGainFocus: When set to true the caret is moved when gaining focus
SelectAllTextWhenFocused: Whether to select all text when the user clicks to give focus on the widget
RevertTextOnEscape: Whether to allow the user to back out of changes when they press the escape key
ClearKeyboardFocusOnCommit: Whether to clear keyboard focus when pressing enter to commit changes
SelectAllTextOnCommit: Whether to select all text when pressing enter to commit changes
AllowContextMenu: Whether the context menu can be opened
KeyboardType: If we're on a platform that requires a virtual keyboard, what kind of keyboard should this widget use?
VirtualKeyboardOptions: Additional options for the virtual keyboard
VirtualKeyboardDismissAction: What action should be taken when the virtual keyboard is dismissed?
ShapedTextOptions: Controls how the text within this widget should be shaped.
OnTextChanged: Called whenever the text is changed programmatically or interactively by the user
OnTextCommitted: Called whenever the text is committed.  This happens when the user presses enter or the text box loses focus.
OverflowPolicy: Sets what happens to text that is clipped and doesn't fit within the clip rect for this widget
IsReadOnly: Sets whether this text box can actually be modified interactively by the user
IsPassword: Sets whether this text box is for storing a password
MinimumDesiredWidth: The minimum desired Width for the text

methods.name: GetHintText
methods.doc: Gets the Hint text that appears when there is no text in the text box

methods.doc:
Gets the widget text
@return The widget text

methods.doc:
Set the minimum desired width for this text box

@param InMinDesiredWidth new minimum desired width
